message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I understand you have a budget. Could you meet me at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,500. Can you consider my revised offer?
